Description: Pottery ostracon with part of black painted line of Coptic, from the shoulder of a vessel, corded with double line at shoulder with two separate lines below, with wavy-line decoration above handle, lower-edge of handle adhering, inside smeared with unidentified substance.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394088) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394088)
